com.thinkaurelius.titan.diskstorage.keycolumnvalue

Interface StoreManager

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    KeyColumnValueStoreManager, KeyValueStoreManager
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractCassandraStoreManager, AstyanaxStoreManager, BerkeleyJEStoreManager, CassandraEmbeddedStoreManager, CassandraThriftStoreManager, HBaseStoreManager, InMemoryStorageAdapter, InMemoryStoreManager, KeyValueStoreManagerAdapter

    public interface StoreManager
    (c) Matthias Broecheler (me@matthiasb.com)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      StoreTransaction beginTransaction(ConsistencyLevel consistencyLevel)
      Returns a transaction handle for a new transaction.
      void clearStorage()
      Deletes and clears all database in this storage manager.
      void close()
      Closes the Storage Manager and all databases that have been opened.
      String getConfigurationProperty(String key)
      Reads the configuration property for this StoreManager
      StoreFeatures getFeatures()
      Returns the features supported by this storage manager
      void setConfigurationProperty(String key, String value)
      Sets a configuration property for this StoreManager.

    • Method Detail

      • beginTransaction

        StoreTransaction beginTransaction(ConsistencyLevel consistencyLevel)
                                  throws StorageException
        Returns a transaction handle for a new transaction.
        Returns:
        New Transaction Handle
        Throws:
        StorageException

      • close

        void close()
           throws StorageException
        Closes the Storage Manager and all databases that have been opened.
        Throws:
        StorageException

      • clearStorage

        void clearStorage()
                  throws StorageException
        Deletes and clears all database in this storage manager.

        ATTENTION: Invoking this method will delete ALL your data!!

        Throws:
        StorageException

      • getFeatures

        StoreFeatures getFeatures()
        Returns the features supported by this storage manager
        Returns:
        The supported features of this storage manager
        See Also:
        StoreFeatures

      • getConfigurationProperty

        String getConfigurationProperty(String key)
                                throws StorageException
        Reads the configuration property for this StoreManager
        Parameters:
        key - Key identifying the configuration property
        Returns:
        Value stored for the key or null if the configuration property has not (yet) been defined.
        Throws:
        StorageException

      • setConfigurationProperty

        void setConfigurationProperty(String key,
                            String value)
                              throws StorageException
        Sets a configuration property for this StoreManager.
        Parameters:
        key - Key identifying the configuration property
        value - Value to be stored for the key
        Throws:
        StorageException
